website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular thermos is not only a perfect option for coffee lovers, but also impressively affordable.
pros: The button-activated single-hand pouring option efficient for carafe build
Can hold a number of beverages beyond coffee
Keeps drinks exceedingly warm or cool
Large mouth opening makes for easy cleaning
cons: The exterior can be a little hot for touching

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: Moving into our new home which is two floors, I was struggling with going up and down every few minutes, as we are big coffee drinkers and love to have our coffee in our bedroom. We had thought of having a "coffee bar" built in our bedroom, as we were used to having our kitchen close by in our first floor home. As I continued to ponder this challenge, I thought of a carafe. Reading reviews on various items, this one had the best reviews. And, indeed, those reviews were correct! I make a full pot in the kitchen, pour it in the carafe, and it stays hot. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Drinks Hot Over 8 Hours.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product for hot and cold drinks; coffee, tea, juice. Did not test cold drinks. Only think I don’t like about product is it’s opening is narrow and cleaning is a problem. Tested this product against another carafe which is also vacuumed pack and heavier. This one is much lighter and frankly I was apprehensive about it. However, it won hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Sundae

customer_reviews.title: 14 Hours Later And the Coffee Was Still Hot!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried thermal coffee carafes before and this is the best one by far. I tested the unit by pre heating by first filling with boiling water. After a couple of minutes I poured the water out and filled with hot coffee. I tested the coffee every 2 hours and after 14 hours the coffee was still perfectly hot. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek large carafe that keeps beverages hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: This is a LARGE carafe. It's double walled stainless steel. I bought this thinking it was glass inside and was not sure how well this would keep beverages hot. Well to my surprise it keeps hot tea very hot for at least 8 hours ...12 hours it's between hot and not so hot. It's very sleek looking for its large size. I drink tea all day and I was tired of making tea forgetting about it nuking it. This way I have hot tea on demand all day. I clean it before bed fill it with hot water and it's warm and ready to be filled in the morning. I'd recommend this product. I'm very happy with my purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: littleannie

customer_reviews.title: I’m sort of disappointed. If I bought it For aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know, I’m sort of disappointed. If I bought it For aesthetic, it’s great. Nice looking, easy enough to clean. Functionally? It claims to keep liquid hot/cold for 12 hours. And actually, I think the box claimed 24. I brewed a fresh pot of coffee, poured it immediately in and sealed it. It was all but warm just a handful of hours later. I’m sort of disappointed as I had hopes of keeping coffee hot and fresh (ish) for about 8 hours. Which is still significantly under what they claim, and still was not accomplished. Not great for longevity but if you want it to use at a breakfast bar for an hour or so, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca  Furmanick

customer_reviews.title: $30 is expensive for a piece of junk that just went to trash...
customer_reviews.text: It kept water hot for a few hours when first bought. Now after a few months, it's become a total piece of junk. The outside is very hot to the touch right after boiling water is poured in. No more vacuum insulation. Tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: May Z

customer_reviews.title: 68 Oz Stainless Steel Thermal Coffee Carafe
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these from Amazon. Have been using them for 2 weeks now to keep coffee hot for a group of employees working in our shop after hours. Pros Attractive Well build but light weight Will hold a full brewed carafe and then some Sturdy handle Easy pour Easy fill and seal Easy to clean Keeps coffee hot for hours Decent price point Cons Ran out of good things to say about this product
customer_reviews.author: M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Works well with hot and cold beverages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carafe to keep coffee hot after brewing in a french press and to keep iced tea cold when I'm working outside. As others have mentioned, taking the time to pre-heat with hot (or cold) water greatly improves the carafe's performance. It does work well, keeping my beverages hot-to-warm (or cold-to-cool) for several hours. It's the perfect size for me and is both attractive on the counter and rugged in the garden. My only complaint has little to do with the design or efficiency of the product, it's that the exterior is annoyingly prone to water spots and fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: I picked this out of many options, but I was very disappointed to receive the goods! !!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this out of many options, Received the product in the morning and was very disappointed! There is a protruding part above the base of the pot, which seems to be a mistake in the manufacturing process. People are not assured of the safety of the insulation pot. There are also big flaws in the upper area. I am very surprised how this quality has 2000+ positive reviews on Amazon. I originally wanted to return the product directly. Now I want to test its heat preservation function. Can it really keep heat for 12 hours. The details are not good, look at the functionality! !!
customer_reviews.author: lihuasun

customer_reviews.title: well . . .
customer_reviews.text: It was okay for the first couple of months, but we noticed that its heat retention was kind of lax. It was diminishing returns thereafter until in the past month where it doesn't even keep coffee warm for more than 20 minutes. It has never been dropped, kicked, or hurled at anyone in rage to account for its loss of ability to do what it's supposed to do: keep coffee hot and drinkable at least for five or six hours. Well . . . not really happy with it. Grateful it didn't cost a bunch. Just replaced it with the Pykal - and THAT is worth every penny. It's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kustesky

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the carafe. It did not keep the coffee hot as promised. If they will refund my money after using it we would like to return it. Very disappointing product. I've had several good carafes that worked and kept my coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product does not keep beverages warm.
customer_reviews.text: From the very beginning this did no keep beverages warm, even when I filled it with hot water before using with coffee. I kept thinning it was just me or I would make due. Finally I have just started using my computer cup at home to keep as much warm as possible. Very disappointing and i wish I had returned it.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Major Product Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Major product flaws make this a challenge to use. I should have known when the seller sends an email before the product shows up, explaining how to use it so it doesn’t spill and leak. -Seal is so tight, pressure builds inside (hot coffee) and pressing the open valve sends hot liquid and steam shooting out 3’ or more. Aim away from you. -After pouring, liquid continues to drip out even after following the directions from the email -Hot liquid stays reasonably hot for about 90 minutes. Expect better but not a problem for me. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wow does this keep stuff hot. I needed a container to hold iced coffee so I made a pot of hot coffee around 7 pm, put it in this carafe, and stuck in the fridge. Over twelve hours later, the dang coffee was still pretty warm!! Not quite my intention but color me impressed lol. Only downside, the opening is too small to get my hand inside so i have to get one of those sponges on a stick to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: I love it. This is the perfect size for holding ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this carafe for a little over a week. So far, I love it. This is the perfect size for holding a large pot of coffee (at least 12 cups). It also helps me save hours of electricity because I have a stove top drip coffee maker and I had to leave the pot sitting on an electric burner to keep the coffee hot. I now make my coffee and pour it into this carafe and it stays very hot until the coffee is gone, which is about 6-8 hours in our house. I have no problem opening and closing the lid. In fact, I find it much easier than previous carafes I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Wilderness Folk

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT keep smaller amounts of coffee hot, which ...
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT keep smaller amounts of coffee hot, which is the reason why I got it. I suppose if it were filled to the top, it may stay hot. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Dribbles after Pouring
customer_reviews.text: A large carafe is really handy if you're entertaining house guests and want to keep a lot of coffee available. But this one tends to dribble after pouring each cup. Instructions tell you how to avoid the dribble, so if you use it just for family, it may be fine. But I feel uncomfortable instructing house guests how to use a carafe. And when you tip it almost upside down to get that last cup of coffee, the pouring spout becomes ineffective. Coffee goes all over the counter. Before you buy this carafe, you may want to shop a little more.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Nice little carafe, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I gave this carafe 5 stars. It does keep the coffee hot which is great. We use it usually every day as we read the papers and watch tv early in the morning. It keeps the coffee hot. Only thing we don't like about this carafe is that the pour spout could be larger. Our other carafe had a much larger pour spout and was much easier to pour from. This one has a small pour spout and takes longer to get the coffee in the cup. Outside that, it does do what we wanted from it. The cap is easy to put on and take off and it handles quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good carafe, but not a thermos if that’s what you want
customer_reviews.text: These carafes were fine for keeping coffee and tea hot for an afternoon outdoors in chilly weather, but did not keep the liquids warm for 12 hours as advertised. I left some tea and coffee in them as a test overnight after filling them at about 4:00pm and the liquids were room temperature in the morning. Full disclosure— they were outside in 55-60 degree weather for about 2.5-3 hours, so that would probably affect performance. They look nice and were okay to clean. When pouring, only a small stream comes out and you have to tip the carafe quite a bit to let the liquid out.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a coffee station in my home that does not have a water supply. I purchased this to hold water on stand by for the coffee & espresso makers. I love the top, it is easy to open with your thumb and closes just as well. No leaking. The head spins on very easily and you don't have to guess if it is in the right position, it can only be screwed on one way. I have not tried it for hot water. The metal is durable, we bang this around a lot without dings or dents.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles E Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Zero Heat Retention
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 to use in my restaurant because of the high rating. Was pleased with appearance and functionality. We started using them in our casual dining area, we are a BUSY restaurant but found that coffee got cold quickly. Outside surface gets very hot. I really wanted to like these but heat loss is faster than any other carafe we have ever used. I can not imagine how people rate these highly. I am not sure I will even donate them.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquids hot for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a group of friends who like to go camping together. We usually make coffee very early in the morning but not all of us get up that early, so our old carafe didn't keep the coffee hot. This carafe keeps it quite hot for hours. When I got it I tested it by putting boiling water into it, closing it up, and then checking the temperature again a couple of hours later. It had only dropped about 20 degrees in that time. It's also compact and light. The only thing I could see that might need improvement is that the opening is kind of narrow, so you need a bottle brush to clean it thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love theses! Keeps things hot forever!!! I suggest you warm them up with hot water before pouring whatever you want to drink in there. I did that out of habit but honestly you probably don’t have to because they are so insulated. Easy to clean and made out of really good quality material. Overall very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Has a narrow opening to prevent cleaning and wiping dry. The company sent instructions on how the vacuum worked and I did apply their instructions
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Slightly irritating design!
customer_reviews.text: I find it disappointing that the top/trigger assembly has an engineering fault that causes it to continue to leak after pouring. This was obviously known by the manufacturer since a work-around was described in the instructions provided with the carafe. Unfortunately the work-around (releasing the trigger with the carafe still in a tilted position) is only partly effective, and you still get a few dribbles out of the spout. This irritates my wife to no end! The manufacturer should have conducted more performance testing and troubleshooting when designing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kile

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband brews coffee using a glass carafe, which has no insulation. I bought this for him to solve his cold coffee issue. I decided to also use it for hot water hen company was over recently. After 16 hours, the water was still hot, even if not quite hot enough to steep tea. Given that it's only supposed to retain heat or cold for 12 hours, I was very impressed. I haven't had occasion to test the cold retention, yet, but expect it to work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: V. A. Beaver

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I used to make tea at my work desk in an electric kettle and was told I could not use the kettle anymore at work. So now I boil the water at home, fill the carafe, and take it to work. It holds exactly the "max" amount of water in the particular kettle I have so it's perfect. 3 cups of tea before lunch and one after, and while the one after isn't scalding hot, it's definitely still hotter than just warm. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Black

customer_reviews.title: Great once warmed up but hard to not make a mess
customer_reviews.text: Overall relatively pleased (barely, hence 3 stars). It keeps the liquids warm but I cannot figure out how to keep this from dripping after pouring. Whether I release the lever before I stop pouring or I leave the lever depressed and simply lift up to stop pouring - ether way I always get drips which is extremely frustrating. I can see in the future that cleaning the top would get more and more difficult as you really can only rinse it. I would recommend you do not mix liquids. IE, have one for coffee/tea and another for other flavored drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Impressive heat retention
customer_reviews.text: We used this over a four-day period while camping with a large group. We brewed the coffee using a Coleman propane drip coffee maker and filled the carafe with the leftovers. The coffee stayed incredibly hot for 5-7 hours and was still quite warm nearly ten hours later. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henline

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Between my wife and I, we each drink at least 2 cups of coffee in the am. Carafe works great to just empty the whole pot into and keep in my home office. My only regret is I did not do my homework and check how tall my space was so as to purchase one that would allow me to drip coffee directly into vs pouring it after it was made. I have a ninja coffee bar and love it but this is too tall to make coffee directly into. Prob should have bought a 1.5 liter or even a 1.0 liter.
customer_reviews.author: redroadster

customer_reviews.title: It works great, holds the heat in.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to send coffee out to some men that work outside all year long. I tested it by filling it with hot water and setting it in the snow to see if it would keep the liquid hot. It passed my test with flying colors. So much so that when I dropped and broke the plastic on the first one I bought, couldn't repair it well enough, I ordered another one just like it as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your coffee hot.
customer_reviews.text: The Cresimo carafe was delivered on time and eagerly used the next morning. Our usual breakfasts on the patio always include multiple trips back to the kitchen to replenish our cups of coffee. Now our cups are refilled at the table without interruption. Although, the Cresimo is rated to keep coffee hot for 12 hours, be realistic. Our Cresimo is dry within the hour! The construction of the handle and the dispenser is common among thermos bottles and should work well for years. After the initial cleaning, my first test was the leak test. Passed with flying colors. We are looking forward to years of service from our Cresimo.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great carafe
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have our own separate carafe's since he gets up earlier than I do and makes his coffee for his carafe and I make my pot when I get up for my carafe. We have done this for years and it works for us. This carafe holds heat really well and I can have a hot cup a hour later with no reheating. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Marino

customer_reviews.title: Unwanted result
customer_reviews.text: For some reason after I pour the first cup of coffee from the unit the remaining coffee comes out with all the "dregs" (for want of a better word) of the coffee. My previous thermos would leave the "dregs" in the bottom so that the coffee poured out "clean" unless I emptied it all out. If I left some in the bottom, say two or three tablespoons the dark stuff did not pour out. With this product that does not happen. I do not shake it or anything like that to disturb the dregs which should settle at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: FMM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I felt compelled to leave a review after using this carafe for about a week. I am a hot tea drinker (8 or more cups per day) and I was constantly having to reheat water. I decided to try this carafe and it's exactly what I needed. I was sold this evening when after being out of the house for 8 hours I came home and the water was still hot! I can't say how it will hold up over time but for now I am very pleased and recommend this product to anyone looking for a way to keep your beverage of choice hot. Not sure how it does for cold but I'm guessing just as well
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Nice with one 'small' issue
customer_reviews.text: This carafe keeps the coffee hot better than most of the other metal options I have ever used. However, the caveat is that the mouth is so narrow that I cannot fit the scrub-brush inside to wash this. The opening is also so narrow that I cannot fit my strainer into the opening - but have tweaked it with the use of a funnel. It also has a tendency to drip all over the place when one pours out the very last bit of any liquid inside (lid open, but attached). The trigger-spout option is much nicer than the twist-top types that don't drip though, so I am willing to overlook that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory George Plutko

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We go to God's Pocket Dive Resort in British Columbia every year. One of the many wonderful features of the dive boat is the hot cocoa after the dives. I was looking for a similar pitcher for our boat at home. This one is perfect, The cocoa has remained piping hot several hours after mixing it. The pitcher doesn't leak a drop and the wide base keeps it from falling as we hit the swells.
customer_reviews.author: Philip N. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Hubby uses this to keep his coffee warm during the day, so he isn't having to take time to microwave cold coffee that was brewed a few hours ago. It works for him and he is happy with it. The coffee runs out before the promised 12 hours, so can only testify to about 6 hours, but coffee is still hot when he drains it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I had company coming in and wanted to be able to keep several servings of coffee hot for at least several hours throughout the morning. I tried the carafe several times, but it did not keep the coffee hot even for a couple hours. I also expected the large (easy to clean) opening and that was not the case at all. And the spout dripped after the pour was finished. I don't understand how so many reviews could show this product so differently. I returned the carafe and thought I should post a review. It did have a nice look, but I needed it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Sally C.

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm a satisfied customer. I think Ms
customer_reviews.text: I have affectionately named my new Cresimo thermal carafe Ms. Dribbles. Ms. Dribbles keeps brewed coffee hot for about 2-3 hours and slightly above luke-warm for 8 hours. It's about half as effective at thermosing as a Zojirushi, but of course it holds far more coffee. Overall I'm a satisfied customer. I think Ms. Dribbles deserved a more refined spout and a thicker winter cap.
customer_reviews.author: Tourgen Roust

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this carafe for my husband as Christmas gift so we haven't actually opened and used it yet. I can say that it came quickly and the company has already reached out to make sure we were happy with it and provide additional tips fro its use, which is really nice of them. The reason I ordered it was because we lost power during a storm recently. When the generator was running we had hot coffee, but we'd shut it off while were out cutting up tress that had fallen. I wanted to be able to have hot coffee (or water for hot chocolate, tea, etc) even when the generator was off. I think this will meet our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are in our 80's and have a problem with certain utensils such as coffee pots and carafes. Our last carafe was getting old and it was hard to hold down the stopper while trying to pour the coffee. With this one, although it is a bit heavier, works fine for both of us. It takes us a while to empty a full carafe of coffee but no matter how long it takes the last cup is as tasty and hot as the first. Several friends have seen and handled it and are asking for details on ordering one. I would recommend it for anyone. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer but open and wash cap after each use
customer_reviews.text: This item will keep your beverage hot for 12 hours so long as you warm it up with boiling water for 3-5 minutes. It's good idea to have an electric water heater. The reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because if you don't wash to top well by opening the spout and let soapy water run through the next batch of coffee will go through the spout making the coffee taste stail. If you do this your coffee will taste fresh the next time you use it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Novoa

customer_reviews.title: An excellent carafe.
customer_reviews.text: I like the durability of the carafe. The best feature is the carafe's ability to keep my tea hot over a long period of time. Since tea tends to stain comes the one problem with the carafe and that is the limitation of cleaners the company allows to clean the carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hot for 24+ hrs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works as advitersie, I gave this to my uncle as a gift. At his house on Wednesday I boiled got water on stove and put in this carafe around 1pm. And the next day at 2:45 pm the, I poured little water on my index finger it was hot and when I opened the lid steam was steam was still coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Sukie

customer_reviews.title: good experience with seller
customer_reviews.text: The seller is generous, light, and correct. Bought the carafe 4 months ago. Put yerba mate in it basically every day. The pourer stopped working. They have to invent a carafe where the top pourer part can be cleaned easily because stuff gets caught in there. Anyways, told the seller and he generously offered a replacement or a refund. The company name is Cresimo. 5 stars for the customer service. om
customer_reviews.author: Anupam Das

customer_reviews.title: 110% highly recommended for tea and coffee lover’s who like Coffee or tea hot ...  :)
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know where should I start my review from ! This is my daily use thermos I need it every day on work so I can keep myself going with some hot tea and this is one of the best thermos I ever bought in my life and it’s 100% true it keep coffee or tea hot for 12 hours .: Not same hot as fresh but still enough hot that you will like I will highly highly highly recommend this to everyone give it a try I am super satisfied with their product .. One of the best super friendly and loyal customer service I’ve ever talk in my life ...
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Cheema

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Did not perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad one. This product does NOT keep coffee hot for an hour, let alone 12 hours. If I pour steaming hot coffee in this carafe, in a half hour it’s far cooler than I prefer my coffee. In an hour it’s not even warm. I wouldn’t buy another one or recommend it to anyone else. Last week I bought a plastic French press from Starbucks that cost $22 —- it keeps the coffee hotter for more time than this carafe. I’m gonna put it in the fridge for ice water and iced tea. It’s sure not much good for hot coffee. Like I said, maybe I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So tired of cold tea and reheating which ruined flavor so I bought this and it works great. Do not use bagged tea because of the chemicals used in production so I brew a pot in the morning of my own blend of loose green tea and dried flowers and berries. Now I can keep it warm all day in this carafe.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Also this carafe is a better price than to buy an ungraded NuWave stainless steel ...
customer_reviews.text: This thermal coffee carafe holds a lot of coffee. I bought it because my NuWave BruHub coffee carafe could not get my coffee warm. This carafe will keep the coffee warmer longer than my NuWave BruHub. Also this carafe is a better price than to buy an ungraded NuWave stainless steel carafe. I believe any customer will be happy with this product as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Great carafe
customer_reviews.text: I just love this coffee carafe. It keeps my coffee warm and that in itself is a big plus. So easy to use and clean. When I set my coffee machine up to brew coffee, I put very hot water into the carafe to warm it up so when the coffee is ready it goes into a warm carafe. It keeps the coffee warm for 12 hours as it is double walled. So happy I bought this as it is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I fill this thing with hot tap water at night. Dump water in the morning (still hot) and pour my coffee and cream into the warmed carafe. If I dont drink it all, the remaining coffee is still warm when I return home 12 hours later! It doesnt leak when knocked over. The spout is rather hard to give a thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ouber

customer_reviews.title: I SERIOUSLY WONDER ABOUT THE REVIEWS OF THIS PRODUCT. ...
customer_reviews.text: I SERIOUSLY WONDER ABOUT THE REVIEWS OF THIS PRODUCT. POURED MY COFFEE INTO THE CARAFE AT 5AM, AND BY 6:30 IT NEEDED TO BE NUKED. WORTHLESS!
customer_reviews.author: JOAN

customer_reviews.title: hot coffee for guests no matter when they wake up
customer_reviews.text: I usually make a pourover for myself in the morning, but with family and guests, I like to get up early and make the coffee to have it hot and ready for those who need caffeine before talking. I fill with hot water first to heat up the carafe, dump it, then fill with steaming coffee. I don't need it hot all day--just for breakfast and this is perfect. Lovely design for the table too.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two that we used for holiday company, and will likely get a third. Did a great job of keeping liquid hot for the 6 hour duration of the party. Do recommend warming them with hot water for about 15 minutes before you put in other beverages, it will help keep your hot beverages from cooling while they heat up the carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Our Office
customer_reviews.text: The Cresimo Thermal Carafe was a perfect solution for our office. The Carafe is easy to use and clean, and it keeps the coffee hot all day. The staff at Cresimo even took the time to send me an email prior to the delivery of their Carafe to provide me with instructions on what I needed to do before using the Carafe for the first time. They even sent a follow-up email to make certain that I was happy with the purchase and, if not, to contact them with any complaints so that they could make it right. Great product and wonderful customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.  Decanted coffee still steaming after 8 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this carafe for a week. It has performed as expected. I preheat it with hot water and then fill it with hot coffee and it is still steaming hot after eight hours. When full, one does need the strength to handle that weight to decant the coffee. But, I am very happy with both the function of this purchase as well as the economy of it. (I do not believe it is overpriced.)
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a recent surgery and I was constantly running back and forth refilling his coffee. This was a genius solution! I fill it and it stays hot, great quality product! The size is generous too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: My coffee pot make about two quarts of coffee, but my old thermal pitcher only held about one quart. That meant that I had to leave the coffee pot sucking electricity to keep the other quart warm. With the 68 Oz Stainless Steel Thermal Carafe, I can pour the entire pot into the pitcher and unplug the coffee maker. The Cresimo carafe keeps the coffee hot and fresh until I pour the last cup late in the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is warm for the first hour in this. After that it cools significantly. At 3 hours, it is luke warm at best, but fortunately my microwave is close by. The seal is tight so it must be poor insulation. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: Really nice coffee pot! It seems to stay much warmer over a period of time than our old pot. Only suggestion, might be a even larger handle than the currently one for a lifting a full pot,--- (which becomes fairly heavy when full of coffee) Another option might be to add more texture on the current handle, for the feel of a more secure grip.
customer_reviews.author: Just Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good except for keeping the liquid hot
customer_reviews.text: In particular the cap is MUCH better than the poor one on the Zojirushi we use to have which kept breaking and not working right. Also, it's not too tall to fit under the sink faucet. The double steel walls don't keep it as hot as the ones with glass inside, unless you prime it first by filling it with hot water, which will warm up the steel walls and they won't absorb as much heat from the liquid. In my case we're using this at work for coffee, which goes fast enough so the keeping-it-warm issue isn't as much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Lazaroff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for #6 pour-over funnel.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Looks good and seems to be well made. Keeps beverage warm/hot most of the day. The only thing I would improve is the screw-on cap. When tightening or loosening, it feels natural to place pressure on the thumb mechanism. This could have potential to break after many uses and I remind myself to reposition my hand. With the risk of changing its sleek appearance, maybe including a grip area on the cap would prevent this and improve function? It works perfect with my #6 pour-over cone funnel. Overall, I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Construction and usability exceeds expectation
customer_reviews.text: The unit replaced another one, while camping some thought it could be used over a burner to heat a liquid. Not a good idea. This carafe is very helpful on camping trips to keep coffee warm. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Frodo Baggins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm and does not leak
customer_reviews.text: Happy this one doesn't leak, my husband spilled coffee everywhere with his old one, grabbed this one quick on a business trip when hubby called said his old one finally died...came fast with prime and I do not miss the trail of coffee drips his old one left, he says keeps coffee warm all day at work usually finishes by 3 or 4 pm and makes the pot at 8 am so not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uh...How does a thermal carafe just 'give up'?
customer_reviews.text: So after using this for 3 months the coffee was lukewarm after 3 1/2 hours. After 6 months I noticed that the outside was hot to the touch after filling it and coffee was lukewarm after 1 1/2 hours. I never dropped it or abused it in anyway, it just stopped 'working'! I actually had to go back to using my old Thermos thermal carafe (8 years old) with a bad seal again, and coffee was still hot after 4 hours! Puzzling.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on the counter. Stainless steel inside and out, which is great for klutzes like me. Design and build seems solid, with no leaking and no dripping while pouring. Just be sure you heed the simple instructions and the very brief email the maker sends you upon purchase. I've only had it for a week, but trust me: I'll be back if it doesn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my review. When I used this pot the first time it didn’t hold the heat even an hour. Second time—just as bad. Still I thought it was just my fault. This morning it didn’t keep it hot for my second cup of coffee. As you can see I don’t use it that often but it is useless and I’ll have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Orphan Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I made hot chocolate for the family. I made two breakfast for my children they leave the house very early for school its still dark outside. I also clean the entire downstairs which everything took about 4 hours. The hot chocolate was still hot and amazing. I talking hot not warm hot. Its a good investment for the holidays also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: At 7:30 a.m. I filled the carafe with hot coffee and at 2 p.m., it was still piping hot!! No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Stay hot and dry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermos because I drink a lot of tea, and I wanted something that could hold a decent amount of water, and keep it hot. This thermos has been awesome! As long as you allow an extra second or two after pouring for excess water to finish coming out it’s very leakproof. I filled it with boiling water and put it in my large purse on its side and my purse wat completely dry when I got to work. The water was still coming out hot hours after I got to work. Great purchase for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Launspach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic !
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3L by mistake and this one. I kept this one and send the 3L back. I need hot water all day so this was the best choice for me. My mom accidentally heated the carafe on the stove it got damaged from the bottom but it is still working wonderfully! It says it keeps beverages hot for 12 hrs, I use mine only for water and i have hit water for 24hrs then stays warm for up to 2 days!!!!! Kid you not and they have not paid me or offered anything in return for this review. I recommend this carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle A

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased 10 pots for our church right before a funeral. Nice size for the elderly to handle and easy to hold and pour. I did ask if they retained the heat as that was the problem with the old ones....someone said "there was still steam coming out". SO, let's hope they fulfill our mission. We liked the discount with multiples as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary  "macraw"

customer_reviews.title: Kept Coffee Hot For Hours
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time for a dinner party this weekend and at the 5 hour mark, the coffee in the carafe was still good and hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: This carafe has a design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This carafe dribbles. Over all I like this carafe: it holds a full pot of brewed coffee from a Cuisinart with plenty of room for cream and sugar, it keeps the coffee hot/warm/drinkable for the better part of a day, easy to keep clean. The one major flaw? After pouring a cup of coffee, the pour spout dribbles. Every. Time. What a pain. Not sure if this is an isolated issue with just my carafe or a major design flaw, but it's a deal breaker for me. I'm giving this one away and buying a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Radtke Nord

customer_reviews.title: durable material
customer_reviews.text: the first thing i did was to put a boiling hot water to it and set it aside for about 14 hours, and surprisingly, water was really hot, like steamy hot. I like this product, and the last one we had was glass on the inside, it was good but the glass was broken to small pieces for a reason that we didn't know, we just found it like that one morning. This one is stainless steal inside out, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawit

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps things hot!
customer_reviews.text: This really works well for the price. Good size and really keeps things HOT for a long period of time. Very impressed by how well it works. I've been using it for picnics bringing coffee or tea. Lasts for hours. I usually pack it upright, so can't speak too confidently about the leak proof, but it seems to create a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Carafe
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stainless steel coffee carafe. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I wish they made a smaller one, like 32oz. I only use it on the weekends when I make coffee for my wife and I. We only have a couple cups each. This carafe is so large that the coffee can cool off a bit before we drink it all. Maybe they do make a smaller one and I just didn't see it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: borno

customer_reviews.title: An outstanding purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this carafe. It really keeps hot coffee hot, it is easy to clean and easy to pour. Finally, I have a coffee carafe I really like and would heartily recommend to other coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this carafe
customer_reviews.text: I love this carafe because it holds hot water for many hours. The product description said up to 24 hours hot water would be kept hot but it was about 12 hours. It still does a good job so I high recommend this product if you are looking for a carafe for your tea or coffee. It is easy to use so my kids under teen can use it with no worry. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Yuko

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking But Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This nice little carafe looks great--polished and elegant--but the coffee just doesn't stay hot very long. Within a couple of hours, the coffee is just a little better than warm. It just doesn't keep the coffee very hot.
customer_reviews.author: InOrlando

customer_reviews.title: Hot coffee, outdoors, all night.
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these to hold urn-brewed coffee in a shady park, day and night, for a three-day fair. We had exactly zero complaints about the coffee this year. The carafes are huge, with a 40-pot urn unable to fill both at once. The flow is a little trickle-y, so some people get impatient and try to unscrew the top.
customer_reviews.author: Darin L Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: best carafe I have found
customer_reviews.text: one of the only Carafee that actually hold the coffee from my 14 cup coffee maker! looks great and keeps my coffee hot for at least 10 to 12 hours. It has a small footprint. base is 5" across. You do need a bottle brush to clean it as the top opening is not big enough to get your hand in to clean it. Other than being a little difficult to clean, it's a great Carafe. I plan on buying another to keep in our 5th wheel camper.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking carafe and great customer service / support
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this carafe and were extremely satisfied with it. However, after about a year of use, the carafe started losing heat (not sure why but even on the exterior, the carafe was hot to the touch). I got in touch with the company, and after a few emails back and forth, Frank Colangelo from the Cresimo Support Team offered to ship out a new one, extending the factory warranty for another year for the new carafe. We are once again satisfied customers, owning a beautiful carafe that doesn't drip, and now maintains the heat properly.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it hot
customer_reviews.text: I did not do any fancy tests. I poured a fresh pot of coffee into the carafe so I could also make a pot of decafe. At some point someone put the carafe into the refrigerator after I had my 2 large cups. The next day maybe 19 hour later the coffee was still warm. 2 things; 1; I didn't pre-heat carafe with hot water wich i normally do 2; I did not fill the carafe because of my first 24 oz. mug. So the next morning, although the coffee wasn't hot, I was impressed that it was still warm considering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't seem to keep coffee hot.  may want to send back for a better one
customer_reviews.text: we are trying it , but if it doesn't keep it hot we would like to send back for one that keeps coffee hot.do you have any suggestions please let me know the procedure for sending back if we should decide to 1/29/2018 I HAVE NOT HEARD A REPLY FROM YOU IF I WAS TO RETURN THIS THERMO AND GET ANOTHER ONE THAT WOULD KEEP MY COFFEE HOT. PLEASE REPLY-I DON'T WANT TO WRITE A BAD REVIEW, I WOULD RATHER TRY ANOTHER ONE.
customer_reviews.author: glenn hegna

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the ease of use and cleaning. We have coffee all through the day and the unit sits on my desk dispensing hot coffee until I go home.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Hot Coffee and Size
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee thermos. This is great - easy to clean - does not leak - holds an entire pot of coffee and the lid is easy to twist on and off. The thermos keeps my coffee hot for about eight hours (mind you I love my coffee super hot) - and it is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: KelliMarie

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: The lid is poorly designed. I am a design engineer and never would let the design of this lid proceed into manufacturing. I got an email from you on how to pour with it. It helps some but coffee still runs out when you straighten the carafe up. It is also hard to get all the coffee out of the carafe without removing the top completely.i do not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Dick Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Holds an entire pot of coffee
customer_reviews.text: This carafe is great. It fits more than a pot of coffee and my husband loves taking it out to his man cave. It doesn't keep it warm for 12 hours, but it's hot enough long enough that he probably finishes it before it's lukewarm. You have to be careful with the spout because it can leak, but it's easily remedied. It was a great surprise and he was pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: s losee

customer_reviews.title: Holds a whole pot of coffee and keeps it hot!
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than the SHARPER IMAGE carafe I've had for awhile. It not only holds twice as much coffee as my old one, but it also keeps the coffee hot much longer. I truly love this new pot. Love the stainless Steel exterior, also.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Coffee....Warm/ Great for Company
customer_reviews.text: I do like the sleek design. Easy to clean, easy to fill. It does not keep the coffee hot for twelve hours as advertised, though. I tried that, thinking I could make it the night before and have hot fresh coffee in the morning. It was more warm and a little off. At 8 hours, it was warm-er and not as off. It does not leak on the sides, but when you pour, it's not a smooth stream. On the up side, it is great to have with company. Bringing a coffee carafe to the table, or bringing it outside is very convenient.....and classy, albeit that they are not going to stay for several hours, that is.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T.

customer_reviews.title: Great carafe!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to hold and pour. The design is great. We primarily intend to use the carafe as a second pot to hold decaf/regular coffee once brewed when we are hosting an event. We did just use it for hot chocolate, and the beverage stayed nice and hot!
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: worked only for two days
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a container that can store hot water to make tea. After reading the reviews, I decided to give this a try. Shipping was fast. It arrived within 2 days after order. For the first two days it worked very well. It keeps water hot for over 8 hours. However, it did last longer. On the third day, when I fill in hot water, the external surface of the carafe got really hot and water become cold within 2 hours. After emptying the water, I can look inside it and found that rusts developed at the bottom of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Qi Wen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep hot for 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: It says on the package , " It will keep hot for 24 hours " , it doesn't !! Maybe 12 hours at best , I did as the instructions said , " Preheat with hot water for 5 - 10 minutes " , it made no difference , coffee was cold when I poured it out this am !! Very disappointed with this carafe !!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel W. Racanelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stainless Steel inside and out...
customer_reviews.text: Nice carafe, but it holds air enough that everytime you push the lever to pour a cup, it releases air...sometimes enough to spray out all over the area in front of it. More useful if you fill it with very hot water before putting coffee or hot beverage in it...keeps coffee hot for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: onesubjectless

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks hot!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps drinks hot and doesn't change the taste. But the lid makes it hard to clean. I do have to remove the plastic ring to clean the cream that gets stuck from chai tea.
customer_reviews.author: redflower

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for samples at events. Once I heat up the liquid, it keeps it at that temperature from the time I leave my house until I return home. I notice no change in temperature at all. Excellent product. I am considering getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!  Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a party this weekend the coffee was nice a hot for hours. Even the next morning when I went to clean it out, the coffee was still warm not hot but it was still tasting fresh. Just needed to warm it up in the microwave for a few seconds and taste great! I only used it once. I hoping it continues to be this useful of a product. Also remember to boil water and let it sit thermos for 15mins before pouring your hot beverage of choice so it can last very hot al day.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it does not require the thermos to be preheated to keep the drink hot. Easy to pour with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lemmy&B

product_meta.title: Cresimo 68 Oz Stainless Steel Thermal Coffee Carafe/Double Walled Vacuum Flask / 12 Hour Heat Retention / 2 Liter Tea, Water, and Coffee Dispenser
feature_bullets: LONG HEAT AND COLD RETENTION » Cresimo’s vacuum insulation technology locks in temperature to preserve flavour and freshness, that keeps beverages hot for 12 hours or cold for 24 hours.
QUALITY » Our double walled thermal carafe coffee holder is made up of a durable 18/8 stainless steel interior and exterior, built to withstand the demands of everyday use.
SINGLE HAND POURING » Pour spout opens easily with push button ease, making one-handed pouring of this coffee carafe simple.

USER FRIENDLY » It’s large mouth opening makes filling and cleaning easy; it can even be used with ice for extra cold refreshment. It’s outer body stays cool to the touch when filled with hot liquids and is condensation-free with cold beverages. Perfect as a hot water dispenser, tea dispenser, or for hot chocolate.

WORRY FREE 1 YEAR WARRANTY » 100% Guarantee! If you are not completely satisfied, contact us immediately! This warranty is exclusive to sales through Cresimo only and purchases made through unauthorized re-sellers will not be covered by this same manufacturer’s warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,148 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
